Articles.Content: I found this picture of an artist's conception of a KSP-NASA collaboration. Notice the Rockomax Brand Adapter 02, the PB-NUK Radioisotope Thermoelectric Generator, and the Rockomax X200-16 Fuel Tank. Also, is that an early prototype of the Communotron 88-88?
I assume it was meant to do Science! on the Mun I MEAN MOON
The Ulysses probe, obviously a KSP-NASA joint project. For Science!
KSP is based off of reality, not the other way around.

KSP is based off of reality, not the other way around.

Lies, I tell you. Just the sort of rumours RealWorld people would spread.

KSP is based off of reality, not the other way around.

No, really??
Finally, someone else sees it. For over a year, I have related that probe to KSP. I have a picture of that on my wall and whenever I look at it, I just think "Look its a Rockomax adapter".

Look at this thread from a while back. It is proof that KSP inspires real life, not that real life inspires KSP. (The video especially)

Mars-Exploration-Vehicle-Concept
